allOf.description: Azure data factory nested object which contains information about creating pipeline run

runtimeState.description: Indicates if trigger is running or not. Updated when Start/Stop APIs are called on the Trigger.

allOf.description: Base class for all triggers that support one to many model for trigger to pipeline.

pipelines.description: Pipelines that need to be started.

items.description: Pipeline that needs to be triggered with the given parameters.

parameters.description: An object mapping parameter names to argument values.

BlobEventsTrigger.description: Trigger that runs every time a Blob event occurs.

blobPathBeginsWith.description: The blob path must begin with the pattern provided for trigger to fire. For example, '/records/blobs/december/' will only fire the trigger for blobs in the december folder under the records container. At least one of these must be provided: blobPathBeginsWith, blobPathEndsWith.

blobPathEndsWith.description: The blob path must end with the pattern provided for trigger to fire. For example, 'december/boxes.csv' will only fire the trigger for blobs named boxes in a december folder. At least one of these must be provided: blobPathBeginsWith, blobPathEndsWith.

events.description: The type of events that cause this trigger to fire.

scope.description: The ARM resource ID of the Storage Account.

allOf.description: Azure data factory nested object which contains information about creating pipeline run

runtimeState.description: Indicates if trigger is running or not. Updated when Start/Stop APIs are called on the Trigger.

allOf.description: Base class for all triggers that support one to many model for trigger to pipeline.

pipelines.description: Pipelines that need to be started.

items.description: Pipeline that needs to be triggered with the given parameters.

parameters.description: An object mapping parameter names to argument values.

BlobTrigger.description: Trigger that runs every time the selected Blob container changes.

folderPath.description: The path of the container/folder that will trigger the pipeline.

parameters.description: An object mapping parameter names to argument values.

maxConcurrency.description: The max number of parallel files to handle when it is triggered.

allOf.description: Azure data factory nested object which contains information about creating pipeline run

runtimeState.description: Indicates if trigger is running or not. Updated when Start/Stop APIs are called on the Trigger.

MultiplePipelineTrigger.description: Base class for all triggers that support one to many model for trigger to pipeline.

pipelines.description: Pipelines that need to be started.

items.description: Pipeline that needs to be triggered with the given parameters.

parameters.description: An object mapping parameter names to argument values.

RecurrenceFrequency.description: Enumerates possible frequency option for the schedule trigger.

count.description: Maximum ordinary retry attempts. Default is 0. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer), minimum: 0.

intervalInSeconds.description: Interval between retries in seconds. Default is 30.

allOf.description: Azure data factory nested object which contains information about creating pipeline run

runtimeState.description: Indicates if trigger is running or not. Updated when Start/Stop APIs are called on the Trigger.

allOf.description: Base class for all triggers that support one to many model for trigger to pipeline.

pipelines.description: Pipelines that need to be started.

items.description: Pipeline that needs to be triggered with the given parameters.

parameters.description: An object mapping parameter names to argument values.

ScheduleTrigger.description: Trigger that creates pipeline runs periodically, on schedule.

Trigger.description: Azure data factory nested object which contains information about creating pipeline run

runtimeState.description: Indicates if trigger is running or not. Updated when Start/Stop APIs are called on the Trigger.

TumblingWindowFrequency.description: Enumerates possible frequency option for the tumbling window trigger.

allOf.description: Azure data factory nested object which contains information about creating pipeline run

runtimeState.description: Indicates if trigger is running or not. Updated when Start/Stop APIs are called on the Trigger.

TumblingWindowTrigger.description: Trigger that schedules pipeline runs for all fixed time interval windows from a start time without gaps and also supports backfill scenarios (when start time is in the past).

pipeline.description: Pipeline that needs to be triggered with the given parameters.

parameters.description: An object mapping parameter names to argument values.

delay.description: Specifies how long the trigger waits past due time before triggering new run. It doesn't alter window start and end time. The default is 0. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string), pattern: ((\d+)\.)?(\d\d):(60|([0-5][0-9])):(60|([0-5][0-9])).

endTime.description: The end time for the time period for the trigger during which events are fired for windows that are ready. Only UTC time is currently supported.

frequency.description: The frequency of the time windows.

interval.description: The interval of the time windows. The minimum interval allowed is 15 Minutes.

maxConcurrency.description: The max number of parallel time windows (ready for execution) for which a new run is triggered.

retryPolicy.description: Retry policy that will be applied for failed pipeline runs.

count.description: Maximum ordinary retry attempts. Default is 0. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer), minimum: 0.

intervalInSeconds.description: Interval between retries in seconds. Default is 30.

startTime.description: The start time for the time period for the trigger during which events are fired for windows that are ready. Only UTC time is currently supported.
